titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Yale Repertory Theatre Scripts Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Monica Achen

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 25, 2019 at 00:00

did.abstract: The collection consists of scripts from plays produced by the Yale Repertory Theatre. Individual records for these scripts are also available in Orbis.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale Repertory Theatre Scripts Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Repertory Theatre Scripts Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of scripts from plays produced by the Yale Repertory Theatre. Individual records for these scripts are also available in Orbis.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Scripts are arranged chronologically by year of production, then alphabetically by author's last name.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Scripts are arranged chronologically by year of production, then alphabetically by author's last name.
